input.sentences: the crowd lined the streets and awaited for the parade to start ...
then | here comes the drum line !
they were led by an excellent bass drummer | whom had some of the best skills the town had seen .
just ask [female] | as she cheers loudly for the drummers and the remaining parade members .
as the parade finished | the families were happy with what they saw and begin to head toward their vehicles .
output.sentences: On the street we saw what was the start of the annual parade.
The first line was poople marking the march time withe the drum
The whole town was proud of the skills they showed as they led the way down the street.
The remaining people in the parade were loudly chanting along withe the crowd.
We all headed towards our vehicles when the parade past, and began to head home.
